name: Last Picnic
description:
Created for 3D Game Design 12.

Use WASD or arrow keys to control your marble.

Traverse through fantastical lands to finally have your last picnic. 

A simple adventure platformer game with aesthetics like a child's imagination.

Ice cubes, apples, chocolate, flowers, and cakes are scattered around the land! Go on a journey to find snacks and gifts to bring on your last picnic! Touch the picnic basket at the end to win and finally be allowed to rest. Or if you want, try to find all 80 collectables!
